text: Boško Krunić (21 October 1929 in Prhovo - 23 January 2017 in Novi Sad) was a Yugoslavian Communist political figure. He was a Chairman of the Presidium of League of Communists of Yugoslavia for one year between 1987 and 1988. Krunić died on 23 January 2017 from a stroke at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Yugoslavian communist politicians
title: Boško Krunić
